name: flutter_boilerplate
description: Flutter boilerplate project for faster start

scripts.clean:build:prod: flutter clean && flutter pub get && flutter build apk --flavor prod -t lib/main_prod.dart --release
scripts.clean:build:dev: flutter clean && flutter pub get && flutter build apk --flavor dev --release
scripts.analyze: flutter pub run dart_code_metrics:metrics analyze lib
scripts.analyze:unused-file: flutter pub run dart_code_metrics:metrics check-unused-files lib
scripts.analyze:unused-codes: flutter pub run dart_code_metrics:metrics check-unused-code lib

author: Philip Purwoko
